lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons have reached an agreement in principle with the city of Detroit and Olympia Entertainment for the team to move from the suburbs to downtown, according to a person with knowledge of the negotiations.

headline.print_headline: AP Source: Detroit Pistons Nearing Downtown Move
headline.main: AP Source: Detroit Pistons Nearing Downtown Move

snippet: The Detroit Pistons have reached an agreement in principle with the city of Detroit and Olympia Entertainment for the team to move from the suburbs to downtown, according to a person with knowledge of the negotiations....
